J52oyP.name: Joe's filter

modules.name: header
Global defaults
modules.subtitle: The first layer of styling and filtering
modules.description: This provides some default styling options to apply to all items, unless overridden by a module below. This also provides an option to explicitly show and hide specific items. This list however can be overridden in a below modules as well.

inputs.label: Items to show icons for (if not showing for all items)
Hide items owned by other players
Hide despawn timer for items below this value
Hide prices for items below this value
Hide icons for items below this value
Hide stackable items below this value
Hide non-stackable items below this value

modules.name: Item tiers
modules.subtitle: Pick out the good stuff
modules.description: This highlights items based on their values. By default tiers are 20k, 100k, 1m, and 10m, with loot beams appearing starting at 1m.

modules.name: Uniques
modules.subtitle: Uniques are special! (even if they're not worth a lot)
modules.description: Add custom effect to unique items. By default this gives uniques on this list a loot beam. This can layer with other styling such as item tiers.

inputs.label: List of uniques to apply custom unique style to (by default just lootbeam)

modules.name: Currency
modules.subtitle: Money makes the world go 'round
modules.description: This module provides styling and quantity filters for all currencies in the game.

modules.name: Clue Scrolls
modules.subtitle: Can you do me one small favor?
modules.description: This module provides clue tier filters and custom styling for each clue tier.

modules.name: Remains
modules.subtitle: Don't open dead inside
modules.description: For filtering out bones, ensouled heads, ashes, and shades of morton remains

inputs.label: Minimum value to display remains at
Shades of morton remains to force hidden

modules.rs2f:
/*@ define:module:remains
---
name: Remains
subtitle: Don't open dead inside
description: |
  For filtering out bones, ensouled heads, ashes, and shades of morton remains
*/

#define CONST_BONES_LIST [   "Bones",   "Wolf bones",   "Burnt bones",   "Monkey bones",   "Bat bones",   "Big bones",   "Jogre bones",   "Wyrmling bones",   "Zogre bones",   "Shaikahan bones",   "Babydragon bones",   "Wyrm bones",   "Wyvern bones",   "Dragon bones",   "Drake bones",   "Fayrg bones",   "Lava dragon bones",   "Raurg bones",   "Hydra bones",   "Dagannoth bones",   "Ourg bones",   "Superior dragon bones",   "Bleached bones",   "Small zombie monkey bones",   "Large zombie monkey bones",   "Small ninja monkey bones",   "Medium ninja monkey bones",   "Gorilla bones",   "Bearded gorilla bones", ]
#define CONST_ASHES_LIST [   "Fiendish ashes",   "Vile ashes",   "Malicious ashes",   "Abyssal ashes",   "Infernal ashes", ]
#define CONST_SHADES_REMAINS_LIST [   "Loar remains",   "Phrin remains",   "Riyl remains",   "Asyn remains",   "Fiyr remains",   "Urium remains", ]
#define CONST_ENSOULED_HEAD_LIST [   "Ensouled goblin head",   "Ensouled monkey head",   "Ensouled imp head",   "Ensouled minotaur head",   "Ensouled scorpion head",   "Ensouled bear head",   "Ensouled unicorn head",   "Ensouled dog head",   "Ensouled chaos druid head",   "Ensouled giant head",   "Ensouled ogre head",   "Ensouled elf head",   "Ensouled troll head",   "Ensouled horror head",   "Ensouled kalphite head",   "Ensouled dagannoth head",   "Ensouled bloodveld head",   "Ensouled tzHaar head",   "Ensouled demon head",   "Ensouled hellhound head",   "Ensouled aviansie head",   "Ensouled abyssal head",   "Ensouled dragon head", ]

/*@ define:input:remains
type: number
label: Minimum value to display remains at
*/
#define VAR_REMAINS_MINIMUM_VALUE 0

/*@ define:input:remains
type: enumlist
label: Bones to force hidden
enum: [
  "Bones",
  "Wolf bones",
  "Burnt bones",
  "Monkey bones",
  "Bat bones",
  "Big bones",
  "Jogre bones",
  "Wyrmling bones",
  "Zogre bones",
  "Shaikahan bones",
  "Babydragon bones",
  "Wyrm bones",
  "Wyvern bones",
  "Dragon bones",
  "Drake bones",
  "Fayrg bones",
  "Lava dragon bones",
  "Raurg bones",
  "Hydra bones",
  "Dagannoth bones",
  "Ourg bones",
  "Superior dragon bones",
  "Bleached bones",
  "Small zombie monkey bones",
  "Large zombie monkey bones",
  "Small ninja monkey bones",
  "Medium ninja monkey bones",
  "Gorilla bones",
  "Bearded gorilla bones"
]
*/
#define VAR_BONES_HIDE [   "Bones",   "Wolf bones",   "Burnt bones",   "Monkey bones",   "Bat bones",   "Big bones",   "Jogre bones",   "Wyrmling bones",   "Zogre bones", ]

/*@ define:input:remains
type: enumlist
label: Ashes to force hidden
enum: [
  "Fiendish ashes",
  "Vile ashes",
  "Malicious ashes",
  "Abyssal ashes",
  "Infernal ashes"
]
*/
#define VAR_ASHES_HIDE [   "Fiendish ashes",   "Vile ashes", ]

/*@ define:input:remains
type: enumlist
label: Shades of morton remains to force hidden
enum: [
  "Loar remains",
  "Phrin remains",
  "Riyl remains",
  "Asyn remains",
  "Fiyr remains",
  "Urium remains"
]
*/
#define VAR_SHADES_REMAINS_HIDE []

/*@ define:input:remains
type: enumlist
label: Ensouled heads to force hidden
enum: [
  "Ensouled goblin head",
  "Ensouled monkey head",
  "Ensouled imp head",
  "Ensouled minotaur head",
  "Ensouled scorpion head",
  "Ensouled bear head",
  "Ensouled unicorn head",
  "Ensouled dog head",
  "Ensouled chaos druid head",
  "Ensouled giant head",
  "Ensouled ogre head",
  "Ensouled elf head",
  "Ensouled troll head",
  "Ensouled horror head",
  "Ensouled kalphite head",
  "Ensouled dagannoth head",
  "Ensouled bloodveld head",
  "Ensouled tzHaar head",
  "Ensouled demon head",
  "Ensouled hellhound head",
  "Ensouled aviansie head",
  "Ensouled abyssal head",
  "Ensouled dragon head"
]
*/
#define VAR_ENSOULED_HEADS_HIDE [   "Ensouled goblin head",   "Ensouled monkey head",   "Ensouled imp head",   "Ensouled minotaur head",   "Ensouled scorpion head",   "Ensouled bear head",   "Ensouled unicorn head",   "Ensouled dog head",   "Ensouled chaos druid head",   "Ensouled giant head", ]


apply (name:VAR_BONES_HIDE) {
    hidden = true;
}
apply (name:CONST_BONES_LIST && value:<VAR_REMAINS_MINIMUM_VALUE) {
    hidden = true;
}

apply (name:VAR_ASHES_HIDE) {
    hidden = true;
}
apply (name:CONST_ASHES_LIST && value:<VAR_REMAINS_MINIMUM_VALUE) {
    hidden = true;
}

apply (name:VAR_SHADES_REMAINS_HIDE) {
    hidden = true;
}
apply (name:CONST_SHADES_REMAINS_LIST && value:<VAR_REMAINS_MINIMUM_VALUE) {
    hidden = true;
}

apply (name:VAR_ENSOULED_HEADS_HIDE) {
    hidden = true;
}
apply (name:CONST_ENSOULED_HEAD_LIST && value:<VAR_REMAINS_MINIMUM_VALUE) {
    hidden = true;
}

modules.name: Chambers of Xeric
modules.subtitle: The twisted bow awaits...
modules.description: This provides per-item filters and custom styling for all drops that happen during your chambers of xeric raid. By default this styles each drop uniquely so they are easier to pick off the ground.

inputs.label: Items to exempt from ownership filtering

modules.name: Theatre of Blood
modules.subtitle: Enter the Theater
modules.description: This provides unique styling for the dawnbringer and salve amulet (e) items which are frequently found on the ground in the theater.

modules.name: Tombs of Amascut
modules.subtitle: Beneath blessed sands
modules.description: This provides per-item filters and custom styling for all drops within the Tombs of Amascut. By default this styles each drop uniquely and filters out a MVP items and books.

modules.name: Bossing
modules.subtitle: Break their bones!
modules.description: This provides area-based item filtering for bosses. (Just GWD covered so far)
modules.rs2f:
/*@ define:module:bossing
---
name: Bossing
subtitle: Break their bones!
description: |
  This provides area-based item filtering for bosses. (Just GWD covered so far)
*/

#define CONST_GOD_WARS_DUNGEON_AREA [2816, 5184, 0, 2943, 5375, 3]

/*@ define:input:bossing
type: stringlist
label: God Wars Dungeon force shown
group: God Wars Dungeon
*/
#define VAR_BOSSING_GOD_WARS_DUNGEON_SHOW [   "Hammer", ]

/*@ define:input:bossing
type: stringlist
label: God Wars Dungeon force hidden
group: God Wars Dungeon
*/
#define VAR_BOSSING_GOD_WARS_DUNGEON_HIDE []




apply (area:CONST_GOD_WARS_DUNGEON_AREA && name:VAR_BOSSING_GOD_WARS_DUNGEON_HIDE) {
    hidden = true;
}

apply (area:CONST_GOD_WARS_DUNGEON_AREA && name:VAR_BOSSING_GOD_WARS_DUNGEON_SHOW) {

}

modules.name: Ores
modules.subtitle: The children yearn for the mines
modules.description: Quantity thresholds, filters, and custom styling for all ores. By default colors them based on the item color.

modules.name: Gems
modules.subtitle: Shilo village provides
modules.description: This module provides quantity filtering, tier filtering, and styling for all gem tiers. By default this styles gems to closely match their in-game colors.

modules.name: Bars
modules.subtitle: The thing between ores and armours
modules.description: This module provides bar tier filters, quantity filters, and custom styling for all bars.

modules.name: Herbs
modules.subtitle: Kaqemeex would be proud
modules.description: Provides herb filters, quantity filters per herb, and custom styling for each herb. By default, this gives each herb unique styling.

modules.name: Farming seeds
modules.subtitle: The stuff from the master farmers' pockets
modules.description: Provides specific seed filters and value threshold for filtering out seeds from being shown. The default is to hide lower tier seeds.

inputs.label: Minimum value to display secondaries at
Fruit tree seeds to force hidden
Fruit tree seeds to force hidden

modules.name: Herblore secondaries
modules.subtitle: Eyes, eggs, and everything in-between
modules.description: Provides some basic filtering for herblore secondaries.

inputs.label: Minimum value to display secondaries at

modules.name: Potions
modules.subtitle: Drink up!
modules.description: Filters and styling for potions. By default this filters out lower tier potions and gives every potion unique styling.

modules.name: Food
modules.subtitle: The stuff you eat
modules.description: This module provides filters based on food groups with some sane defaults. It also provides styling options available for every food group that has a filter. This can be done at the group level or on a food-by-food basis. A few popular foods have been given custom styling out of the box.

modules.name: Ignore runelite sidebar item value rules

modules.description:
If you'd like to use the built-in item value rules instead of the item value rules in this filter, turn off the "Disable built-in plugin item value rules" option below.

This is a hack to ignore the built-in item value rules. This filter works based on layering filter rules so we don't exit the filter until this very last module.
